Text: Re Bernie JonesALones GroupThank you Bernie

Bernie JonesALones GroupGood morning If you get a moment can you email the information about the law firm whose has put together my documents and any of your comments about ALones concept Base upon new managementUBS are we on position for ALones to sell in the private market Thank you in advance A Bernard

ALones GroupPlanGood morning Can we talk about an model to move commodity over enron on line by UBS Have a niche marketing approach that have short and long term growth potential under the right management team Need your insight and involvement on the lay of the land A Bernard
